title: The Vampire through History
description: Of all the creatures that stalk the night, none has captured the imagination quite like the Vampire. These days, in popular culture it is almost impossible to read, watch or hear any supernatural tale that does not involve the undead. Particularly in our modern day society the Vampire is held with somewhat high regard; a conflicting mix of fear and wonder, lust and longing.
author: Mr Paul Cuffe
